Level (eg. Junior, Mid, Senior or Lead)

Tonight we are featuring talks from our great mobile developers. Discover new ideas to push the mobile industry forward and learn how to be part of our team.

Event details: June 20th, 6pm, at our offices.

Book your sit today and check-in the day of the event to win amazing prizes.

Stateside is a creative digital production agency, which provides efficient and organic scalable production.\n\nBy cultivating a culture of proactiveness, creative thinking, and professionalism, we are committed to providing companies the boost they need to make a name for themselves in the ever-growing competitive industry.
Register and you will be participating to win prizes during the event such as an Echo dot, an Amazon Kindle and a Vilros RaspBerry PI.\n\nGood Luck!
* In order to win a prize you must be attending to the event.\n* You will need your ID to claim your prize in case you win.
Once you arrive to our office, scan the QR code
